# MetaBorg - Game-Theoretic Optimization
# Generated by: Opus 4.5
# Philosophy: Optimize for wins/hour, not win rate per run.
# Speed is multiplicative, HP is variance buffer, risky play accepted.

# Worships
borg_worships_damage = FALSE
borg_worships_speed = TRUE
borg_worships_hp = TRUE
borg_worships_mana = FALSE
borg_worships_ac = FALSE
borg_worships_gold = FALSE

# Behavior
borg_plays_risky = TRUE
borg_kills_uniques = FALSE
borg_uses_swaps = TRUE
borg_no_deeper = 127
borg_cheat_death = FALSE

# Advanced (from Opus analysis)
borg_munchkin_start = TRUE
borg_munchkin_level = 10
borg_munchkin_depth = 12
borg_self_scum = FALSE
borg_enchant_limit = 10

# Hypothesis: 12-18% win rate but 1.3x wins/hour vs baseline
